Elise Bell

View on GitHub

I'm a 3rd year graduate student in the department of Linguistics at the University of Arizona.

My primary interests are phonology and phonetics, with a focus on Celtic and Native American languages. I'm currently working on an NSF-funded investigation of initial consonant mutation in Welsh.

My dissertation will focus on the distribution of vowel quality and quantity contrasts in the dialect(s) of Welsh spoken in Argentina.
